resources.string: Hello, my name is Mochammad Wibowo Assariy. I am 13 years old and was born on January 23, 2023, in Majalengka. Currently, I am a student at IDN Boarding School Solo. I have a strong interest in computer programming. Outside of school, you will often find me sitting in front of a computer, creating codes and solving problems with logic. Additionally, I always strive to excel in my education.
